name: Thwad Underbrew

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
text: Thwad rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: As a bonus action, Thwad can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Thwad makes three attacks with his maul or his shortbow.

action.name: Maul
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage if Thwad has more than half of his total hit points remaining.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if Thwad has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 204
